About Me. I am an ambitious 18-year-old first-year Computer Science student at the University of the Cordilleras. I possess a profound passion for the field and am driven to master and thrive across Programming, Game Development, Web Development, and Computer Science as a whole. My personal growth accelerates in settings that champion creativity, autonomy, and self-expression.
